701952f-a.text:
Valentine Avenue, west side, south from Bedford Park Boulevard to E. 199th Street. The frame house, at the S.W. corner of the two thoroughfares has stood here since about 1893 and bears No. 216 Bedford Park Boulevard. The 6-story building bears No. 2927-2931 Valentine Avenue.
May 5, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
701952f-a.folder: Valentine Avenue & Bedford Park Boulevard, Bronx, NY
701952f-a.original_title: Bronx: Valentine Avenue - Bedford Park Boulevard

701953f-a.text:
Valentine Avenue, west side, north from and including Bedford Park Boulevard to E. 201st Street. The house in the left foreground
is at the S.W. corner of Bedford Park Boulevard.
May S, 1938
P. L. Sperr
701953f-a.folder: Valentine Avenue & Bedford Park Boulevard, Bronx, NY
701953f-a.original_title: Bronx: Valentine Avenue - Bedford Park Boulevard

701954f.text:
Valentine Avenue, west side, north from but not including Bedford Park Boulevard to E. 201st Street.
May 6, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
